name: entropy-changes-in-mixing-ideal-gasses
description: Examine the change in entropy when two gasses separated by a barrier are mixed.

scripts.install-dependencies: npm install --save bootstrap clean-webpack-plugin css-loader file-loader html-loader html-webpack-plugin mini-css-extract-plugin p5 postcss-loader sass sass-loader style-loader terser-webpack-plugin to-string-loader uglify-js webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server

author: Venkatesh Mopidevi
